about_the_game:
Investigate the strange town of Nightfall Hollow, and see if you can get to the truth.

Enjoy the opening chapter of our game, meet some of the residents, solve a selection of puzzles, and have your first glimpse into Nightfall Hollow. There's plenty of hidden things to discover, and the odd Easter-egg or two as well

We hope you enjoy our demo

content_descriptors.notes: Please note this demo features scenes of blood, horror, death, alcohol abuse and strong language

name: NightFall Hollow - Demo Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
